mapper.select: SELECT A.PERF_DT /* 실적일자 */ , NVL(Q.EOT_DLQ_AMT, 0) AS DQL_AMT /*연체금액*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'RVE_DV_CD', A.RVE_DV_CD) AS RVE_DV_NM /* 구분(할부/매변/손료/위약금/연체가산금) */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'DP_TP_CD', A.DP_TP_CD) AS DP_TP_NM /* 유형(지로/간이/은행/은행이체/가상계좌/카드이체/영업부/수당/RDS/전금/수수료/대손/앱할인) */ , CASE WHEN A.DP_DV_CD = '2' THEN NVL(A.DP_AMT, 0) * -1 ELSE NVL(A.DP_AMT, 0) END AS DP_AMT /* 입금금액(환불인 경우 음수로 표시) */ , SUBSTR(A.PERF_DT, 1, 6) AS PERF_YM /* 실적년월 */ FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL A /* 수납상세 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL B /* 계약상세 */ ON B.CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND B.CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_DLQ_BAS Q /*연체기본*/ ON Q.CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND Q.CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN AND Q.PERF_YM = SUBSTR(A.PERF_DT, 1, 6) WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND A.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}
